name: Blind Video Date Game
blurb: Imagine playing or watching the 1960's The Dating Game Show today from your computer. Now you can with the Blind Video Date game.

rewards.reward: Move to the top of the line in our waiting list and be one of the first players OR watchers.

Sneak peek: Before you play a game, you will receive an email of 10 profile pictures that includes people selected by our casting directors you will play with and random profile pictures of others that you won't ;)

Do you ever need to analyze how the big date went? Are you unsure of what your next move should be \u2013 text, call, or something else?  Do you just want to vent about dating to someone other than your friends or family?  You've come to the right place.  Just like a pitcher needs the coach after a game, why shouldn\u2019t you get a coach through dating?  This reward includes 30 minutes of date coaching over the phone with A Little Nudge for those burning questions about dating - online or off.
The above, PLUS: a special Blind Video Dating Game T-shirt.

Do you ever need to analyze how the big date went? Are you unsure of what your next move should be \u2013 text, call, or something else?  Do you just want to vent about dating to someone other than your friends or family?  You've come to the right place.  Just like a pitcher needs the coach after a game, why shouldn\u2019t you get a coach through dating?  This reward includes 60 minutes of date coaching over the phone with A Little Nudge for those burning questions about dating - online or off.

3 Email Package with David Wygant -- Do you need your biggest dating obstacles solved by one of the premier dating coaches in America? With this reward, you can ask David whatever you want and he'll give you clear, actionable advice that will change your love life forever.
Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: you can submit 10 questions that will be used in episodes of Blind Video Dating Game.
Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: voice-over submissions: you can record voice-over instructions to our player\u2019s audition. Have everyone hear your voice!
Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: a super-vote: your powers are multiplied.  Any time you vote, your vote is worth 10 votes.
Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: a cock-block superpower: you can override the voting results as an audience member.
Priority on the waiting list, the T-shirt, PLUS: beer-goggles superpower: when you play Blind Video Dating Game, a portion of the audience votes are randomly assigned to you.

Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: a wingman superpower: your friend can provide social validation for you, similar to \u201cphone a friend\u201d in Who Wants to Be a Millionaire.

Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: a pick-up artist superpower: gives you another shot at the dating game! As long as you don\u2019t come in last place, you can play again in the next round.
Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: a sausage-fest superpower: immediately flip the game into three chicks mode instead of three dudes.
Priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, PLUS: a peeping-tom superpower: see the contestants you are playing against for 3 seconds during the game.

Need help with your profile and audition tape? \r\n(a) One-on-one meeting via Skype with a Certified eFlirter from eFlirt Expert, (b) Topic suggestions for video and recording tips, (c) Review of your online audition and comprehensive feedback, and (d) One round of profile tweaks
ALL OF THE ABOVE, e.g., priority on the waiting list, sneak peak, the T-shirt, and ALL of the superpowers.
ALL OF THE ABOVE, PLUS: casting director privileges: you can help us decide who should play the game from pre-recorded audition reels from our contestants.
